body_html:
Hey @jasnow, thanks for your work :)

I'm afraid I tend to close this PR without merging it for various reasons:

  1. There are several changes from Time.now.utc to Time.zone.now.utc which return the same datetime value
  2. We don't really need the user's local time zone. In fact in most case we want to use UTC (esp. when comparing the application deadline).
  3. Our specs don't really care about or test for the actual timezone – we just need a date 😄
  4. There are now several additional commits that don't really belong into this PR

However, your patchset made me spot three occurences of Time.now where we would be better of with an explicit Time.now.utc: app/models/mailing.rb:19, app/models/team.rb:95, and app/workers/submission_worker.rb:25

It would be awesome if you could change these as a new PR.

As for 4): I would be great if you grabbed the recent two commits that upgrade Ruby and Rails (i.e. by git cherry-pick) and file a new PR for them.

You put a lot of effort into that – thanks! – and I feel bad to just hit close. Are you ok with splitting it up in smaller PRs?

body:
Hey @jasnow, thanks for your work :)

I'm afraid I tend to close this PR without merging it for various reasons:
1. There are several changes from `Time.now.utc` to `Time.zone.now.utc` which return the same datetime value
2. We don't really need the user's local time zone. In fact in most case we want to use UTC (esp. when comparing the application deadline).
3. Our specs don't really care about or test for the actual timezone – we just need a date :smile: 
4. There are now several additional commits that don't really belong into this PR

However, your patchset made me spot three occurences of `Time.now` where we would be better of with an explicit `Time.now.utc`: [app/models/mailing.rb:19](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/176/files#diff-7a3ce4c117f4fbe67425ddeb1134f73dL19), [app/models/team.rb:95](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/176/files#diff-f552bd398e1182734d6b2df0c309e722L95), and [app/workers/submission_worker.rb:25](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/176/files#diff-a96b7164d6c7405c9b73329852bb415dL25)

It would be awesome if you could change these as a new PR.

As for 4): I would be great if you grabbed the recent two commits that upgrade Ruby and Rails (i.e. by `git cherry-pick`) and file a new PR for them.

You put a lot of effort into that – thanks! – and I feel bad to just hit close. Are you ok with splitting it up in smaller PRs?
